entity.name: Mandar Govenkar, Sahaj Ganesh
entity.description: We are a group of students pursuing BCA second year where our aim is to build efficient and secure features with adherence to regulations.

projects.name: Ease
projects.description: A robust and advanced trading algorithm tailored which incorporates key features like historical data fetching, technical indicators, trade recommendations, simulated trade execution, voice command functionality for efficient trade execution, balance sheet reading for Indian companies which are released quarterly, investors portfolio analysis and suggesting calculated risk analysis.

plans.name: Development Cost
plans.description: This will cover the development cost and purchase of required API, building data storage and cloud stack, and other miscellaneous cost for maintenance.

plans.name: Design Cost
plans.description: This will cover the end to end UX Design cost.
